movie_title: Mars: Mysteries of the Red Planet - 6 Minute English
introduction:
Improve your vocabulary and pronunciation in just six minutes!
Mars has been in the news a lot recen

vocabulary.definition: the feeling of being extremely interested in something
vocabulary.example: Her fascination with astronomy led her to study to become an astronaut.

vocabulary.definition: advanced societies with complex culture and institutions
vocabulary.example: Ancient Egyptian and Mesopotamian civilisations are known for their architectural achievements.

vocabulary.definition: objects launched into space to orbit the Earth, other planets, or celestial bodies
vocabulary.example: The satellite was able to capture high-resolution images of Mars's surface.

vocabulary.definition: the study of the origin, evolution, distribution, and future of life in the universe
vocabulary.example: The astrobiology research team is investigating the possibility of microbial life on Mars.

vocabulary.definition: suitable or good enough to live in
vocabulary.example: Scientists are exploring ways to make Mars more habitable for future human colonization.

vocabulary.definition: unchanging over time or unable to be changed
vocabulary.example: The laws of physics are considered immutable and constant throughout the universe.
